<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">c2f9f1a09368725005087efdfaba1080</macroponent><name>nextResClient</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({ api, event, helpers, imports }) {
  console.log('[nextResClient] Script triggered.');

  return api
    .fetch('/api/x_1782765_nowroom/next_reservation_api/next', {
      method: 'GET',
      headers: {
        'Accept': 'application/json'
      }
    })
    .then(async (res) => {
      console.log('[nextResClient] Response received:', res);

      if (!res.ok) {
        console.error('[nextResClient] Request failed. Status:', res.status);
        throw new Error('Request failed with status ' + res.status);
      }

      const result = await res.json();
      console.log('[nextResClient] Parsed JSON:', result);

      // ]]>ðŸ‘‡<![CDATA[ WICHTIG: Ergebnis in den Client State schreiben
      api.state.setValue('nextRes', result);
      console.log('[nextResClient] State "nextRes" updated:', result);

      return result;
    })
    .catch((err) => {
      console.error('[nextResClient] Fetch error:', err);
      api.state.setValue('nextRes', null);
    });
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-13 10:47:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>9d53f1f5936cf65005087efdfaba1004</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>nextResClient</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NowRoom" source="x_1782765_nowroom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NowRoom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_9d53f1f5936cf65005087efdfaba1004</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-13 14:44:17</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
